_header: My friend if thou will be a servitor
Subjects: manners, treatises on; servants, instructions to; instructions, to servants
_description: Instructions to Serving Men — four 8-line stanzas, with refrain ‘gif thou will be a seruitour’

BodArcSelB24.First Lines:
My frende gif thou will be a seruitureThou tak gude and lere this
                    document…
BodArcSelB24.Last Lines:
…[ ]yne array mak na comparisoun[ ] frend gif thou will be a
                    seruitoure
BodArcSelB24.Facsimiles:
Boffey,  Julia,  and  A. S. G. Edwards, eds.  
             Chaucer, Works. Bodleian Library MS Arch Selden B.24: Facsimile
                Edition.
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1995.
